name: Selecting a Number with the up/down arrows within the "Number Selector" field

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Monday, September 28, 2020 3:50 PM
• Added links to Cypress HW ticket and Github up for grabs issue

inline.description:
Selecting a Number with the up/down arrows within the "Number Selector" field
————————————————————————————
  1. In a message input box (center channel or RHS), type "/dialog" and hit "Enter"

On RN app: Number keyboard should show up to enter input.
inline.expectedResult: • Interactive dialog modal opens and ephemeral post confirming you used the slash command to open the dialog is made
• You should see the up/down arrows appear on the right

inline.description: 1. Click/tap on the up/down arrows that appear on the right
inline.expectedResult: • You should see the number increase when clicking/tapping the up arrow and decreasing when clicking/tapping on the down arrow
